orders: all,
f: 0.01,
d: 0,

particles: { material: custom, eps: sb_eps_data, r: 20 };

textDescriptions.refractive index:
material: AlGaAs,
eps: adachi_gauss, 
G: 0.028, 
cAl: 1, 

matr_el: 7.75E-20,
eps_infra: 1,

g_param: 1,

df: 0.0,
d: 1000
textDescriptions.extinction coefficient:

orders: all,
f: 0.01,
d: 0,

particles: { material: custom, eps: P_Eremeev_PBE_2024_autumn, r: 5 },
include_medium_absorption: false;
